011818d5-aead-49d8-aca6-50a33cb88e96.description:
Connect any logic input to this block to start and stop the racers remotely. 
 Interact with this object to view various race settings
011818d5-aead-49d8-aca6-50a33cb88e96.title: SMAR Race Control

42dd8836-3cbb-495c-86b4-44fb9c9916b3.description:
SMAR Engine - Connect Driver to this block and connect this block to wheel bearings. Can be placed anywhere. 
 Paint Black, grey, light grey, or white To change engine speeds from slowest to fastest.
42dd8836-3cbb-495c-86b4-44fb9c9916b3.title: SMAR Engine

5d8f2445-31bb-4079-94ab-dc1df1e6e3ed.description: Scans and attempts to generate a racing line for Auto Racers. Place at start/finish line with target/screen facing the desired circut direciton (BETA)
5d8f2445-31bb-4079-94ab-dc1df1e6e3ed.title: SMAR Track Generator

645fe8aa-2c33-43c9-8859-f6a03374c62a.description: Crouch and press E to Open Camera, Pres space and shift + right click to close camera
645fe8aa-2c33-43c9-8859-f6a03374c62a.title: SMAR Camera

b20d3826-3235-459c-a4c9-ef1438caaed9.description: Attatch Driver block to this and then connect this to tail lights (only braking)
b20d3826-3235-459c-a4c9-ef1438caaed9.title: Brake Unit

fbc31377-6081-426d-b518-f676840c407c.description:
SMAR Driver - Car AI Driver, connect to steering bearings and SMAR Engine. Place anywhere on ca with steering wheel facing the front. 
 MUST BE PLACED WHILE CAR IS ON LIFT IN ORDER FOR CAR TO BE SCANNED CORRECTLY.
fbc31377-6081-426d-b518-f676840c407c.title: SMAR Driver
